text: Much like many of us, Meryl Streep is missing the Obama family. So much so, in fact, that she decided to carry a piece of them with her everywhere she goes. While filming a movie in New York yesterday, the Oscar - winning actress was spotted by E! News leaving her trailer with a custom purse featuring a photo of Barack and Michelle Obama. Set against a White House backdrop, the former First couple is pictured smiling and dancing on the patent leather handbag. Splash News While it's unclear where the actress bought her personalized Obama bag, I'm hoping it was a DIY project she spent a long afternoon on. Someone call Miranda Priestly because Streep is about to single - handedly start her own Fall 2017 trend of Obama handbags and I am totally on -
